website_summaries.verdict: Solid basic basketball shoe with breathable embroidered uppers and molded medial for great support.
cons: The shoe's tongue is short and awkward

customer_reviews.title: Most Comfortable Sneaker I ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: By far beats all other sneakers I have, for long term comfort, and I have a lot! These are even great for winter weather if you can weatherproof them!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Hard to determine fit until you get them
customer_reviews.text: Although it's a nice and pretty inexpensive shoe, it's hard to determine the fit until you receive the item and put it on. Almost all of the UA shoes I've purchased in the past have a wide base. This particular one unfortunately is very narrow and is uncomfortable for someone like myself who has wide feet. I would still recommend UA as a brand to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Runs small, the back of the shoe is very rigid and stiff.
customer_reviews.text: I have a wide foot and the guy at Dick's said to try UA. They had none in stock, so I ordered these from Amazon. Bought Size 12, toes were at the very end of the shoe and fit was tight across the top of my foot. About a half size small. While it may of stretched a little with use, the back was so stiff, like a hiking boot, that I knew it would rub the back of my leg raw if I attempted to play in them. I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Order half a size up
customer_reviews.text: My son liked the details on these boots & the padding. The colour was true to the pictures too. He was Surprised with the sizing being more snug (in length) as has another pair of Under Armour sneakers the same size but they are more roomy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heavy shoe, not good for quick lateral movement.
customer_reviews.text: Good traction on the shoe. Although it is quite heavy, and depending on your play style can really mess with your feet. These are a tight fit as a lot of people say, but they feel a bit better once you start to break them in. The best way I can describe the feel is that it is akin to wearing a steel toe boot. The plastic at the front makes the shoe heavy, and you can really feel the impact on your toes during sudden cuts or stops.
customer_reviews.author: Vanat

customer_reviews.title: Shoes are not new
customer_reviews.text: The shoes where a perfect fit. The issue I had was that I was supposed to had bought new shoes. I paid 60 dollars for warm shoes. The bottoms of the shoes were completely dirty, and one had a whole scratch. I did end up keeping the shoes though, just because they fit and my son needed shoes to play in his game that that day. In all, aside from the obvious worn part, the shoes are great.
customer_reviews.author: Asia Arnold

customer_reviews.title: They have a nice sleak look!!
customer_reviews.text: Just got them today!! Love them!! They have a nice design!! The tongue of the shoe is kind of non existent, they have a spiral/flap type opening!! They feel like they have decent support and can handle competitive basketball at any level!!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Price Jr.

customer_reviews.title: It is a shame as they look nice.
customer_reviews.text: So frustrating. I always wear a size 10.5 with under armour basketball shoes. These are at least half an inch shorter than my other pair which makes my big toe hit the end. It is a shame as they look nice.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Fraze

customer_reviews.title: Fits well only issue is i thought they were red ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits well only issue is i thought they were red and black but actually neon pink/orange but my son still likes them for basketball
customer_reviews.author: Deezy

customer_reviews.title: My purchase arrive on time and am happy my boys love the sneakers i will recommend this ...
customer_reviews.text: My purchase arrive on time and am happy my boys love the sneakers i will recommend this site to anyone i am happy thanks again
customer_reviews.author: Mary sandy

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice looking and fitting shoe for casual wear
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice looking and fitting shoe for casual wear. I bought it to play bball in and that plastic cap around the toe has murdered my big toes on both feet. I thought they would offer protection from getting stepped on, but its the toes that make contact with this plastic more than anything else...and it hurts.
customer_reviews.author: Vao Pele

customer_reviews.title: Hard to get on your feet
customer_reviews.text: Shoe looks great but its hard to get on. The laces are to short as well.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Sal

customer_reviews.title: Awe the Man Defending the Basket!
customer_reviews.text: Greta Shoes but the sizes are at least 1/2 -1 full size smaller when compared to other athletic shoes.Once i got the right size the shoe was awesome. I scored 15 points and I feel 4 of those points were due to the defender looking at my new shoes. He stood there in awe of these sneaks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great looking shoes! Picture doesn't do them Justis!
customer_reviews.text: Shoes arrived in time. Shoes look better than the picture shown! My son loves them!!
customer_reviews.author: L. Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: Great Basketball shoes, nice price
customer_reviews.text: The colour of these shoes is spectacular! With the comfortable support of Under Armour, the protection for the ankle is really good, better than Nike or Jordan, and the price is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Hugo jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Well padded
customer_reviews.text: I'm fairly new to basketball and therefore basketball shoes but I have noticed that these specifically prevent me from getting blisters compared to ones I've had previously.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Bailey

customer_reviews.title: The heel is set far back it seems and that makes them look odd
customer_reviews.text: The heel is set far back it seems and that makes them look odd. They are comfortable, but I do not like how they are made.
customer_reviews.author: M X Lockwood

customer_reviews.title: Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: It fits perfect and the quality has been amazing. They are still like new.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my boyfriend. He said they fit great and are comfortable. Look good to.
customer_reviews.author: moe

customer_reviews.title: Suspect
customer_reviews.text: Cheap poor quality and don't waste your money Design bad plastic cheap so do pass on these
customer_reviews.author: holuday

customer_reviews.title: but had to get a refund i bought the wrong size for my husband these fit small like
customer_reviews.text: buy 1 size or one size and half up they are bomb! but had to get a refund i bought the wrong size for my husband these fit small like Nikes
customer_reviews.author: SharondaWilliams

customer_reviews.title: Shoes run small
customer_reviews.text: Colors are nice but shoes to narrow and my son couldn’t get his foot in. Will be returning them.
customer_reviews.author: W. Bowler

customer_reviews.title: Go bigger
customer_reviews.text: Definitely runs small in length. Go at least a half size up, if not a full. I wasn't crazy about the tongue either.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Vale

customer_reviews.title: Putting them on sucks
customer_reviews.text: I like the comfort of this shoes but I really hate the struggle to put them on
customer_reviews.author: Jose E Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Excellent I have 7 month that I bought my Under ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent I have 7 month that I bought my Under Armour playing every single week at least once at week, and they seem like new yet...
customer_reviews.author: Henry Adames 01-51250

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Did not like the feel of the high top back. Great looking shoe though.
customer_reviews.author: JohnnyEvil

customer_reviews.title: great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Loved them. Fit awesome, lasted a good while for my teen son.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Great traction and great ankle support but not as comfortable as other shoes.(Kyrie,pg etc.)
customer_reviews.author: Emir

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good, probably gonna buy another pair of these... I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Jper

customer_reviews.title: Uncentered shoe laces
customer_reviews.text: Very difficult to put on due to the uncentered shoe laces
customer_reviews.author: RGM

customer_reviews.title: None
customer_reviews.text: Why is it not the real size 10 Poor construction, one of eyes ripped right off. Now shoe lace doesn’t tie correctly
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I like the way they look and feel. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Gaston

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The style in the pictures isn't the type I was expecting at all.
customer_reviews.author: 1523dub

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like it very much! Comfortable and very well outfit.
customer_reviews.author: Fabio Boffi

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware, these shoes will choke your ankles and scrap your heels.
customer_reviews.text: Shoes fit very awkward with the laces off to the side. I tried them twice and the second time and the back of my heel was scraped by the shoe and got a nasty blister. Very uncomfortable and large/clunky to run in. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Saul Barrera

customer_reviews.title: I like that the front is made wide because I have ...
customer_reviews.text: I like that the front is made wide because I have a wide foot. So all I had to do was put a sock around my shoe trees and stretch them for a few days, then wear them and it's Ok now.
customer_reviews.author: Joel T.

customer_reviews.title: Small and ugly! The front of the shoes slants ...
customer_reviews.text: Small and ugly! The front of the shoes slants to one side so the laces aren’t down the middle.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: the size is cut for a smaller 10.5 than I ware.
customer_reviews.author: chet d.

customer_reviews.title: Very strange design...cut
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst fitting and designed shoe I have even owned. Absolutely ridiculous cut and fit. I wore the once...I am now trying to give them away. Garbage design
customer_reviews.author: Scott Reynolds

product_meta.title: Under Armour Men's NXT Basketball Shoe
product_meta.description: Mesh upper with TPU coated yarn embroidery over forefoot for added structure . Articulated molded medial quarter adds support. Asymmetrical hybrid entry with foam padded collar for extra comfort. Breathable mesh tongue enhances ventilation. Webbed loop, speed-lacing system . Abrasion-resistant TPU toe cap protects against toe drag & increases durability. Die-cut EVA sockliner provides underfoot cushioning & support. Dual density midsole combines Micro Gfoam with Charged Cushioningunder the heel for the ultimate blend of comfort & explosive energy return. Rubber outsole uses herringbone traction pattern to provide maximum floor control & grip. Weight: 12.58 oz.
feature_bullets: Mesh upper with TPU coated yarn embroidery over forefoot for added structure
Articulated molded medial quarter adds support
Asymmetrical hybrid entry with foam padded collar for extra comfort
